trusteeship.translation[0].definitions[0: the job of being a trustee
trusteeship.translation[0].definitions[1: the responsibility for governing an area, which is given to a country or countries by the United Nations
trusteeship.translation[1].definitions[0: the job of controlling a trust or when property or assets are controlled by a trustee
The company was placed into trusteeship in April 1999 through a bankruptcy court.
